content: The Bitcoin Time Capsule 2025-2050This capsule is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology and cryptocurrency. It will be sealed from December 31, 2025, blocking publication, and will remain so until January 1, 2050. Within it, we preserve not only the essence of Bitcoin's journey so far, but also the hopes, innovations, and dreams of a decentralized future, with messages that will endure for decades from the active users of 2025.To all who are here and comment on this capsule in 2050, we ask you to look back with pride at the advances made and continue to pioneer new paths in the world of digital finance with this valuable cryptocurrency called Bitcoin. "This image was created with AI in 2025."Open until December 31, 2025, post your message and leave your mark before the capsule closes for over two decades.
